pl.mazurmarcin.webcalculator.services

Interface CalculatorsService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CalculatorsServiceImpl

    public interface CalculatorsService
    Interface for managing calculations.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BigDecimal[] calculateArea(String inputId, String inputValue)
      Unit converter: Area

      Returns the set of the result as a BigDecimal[] for given calculator id and inputValue inputId determines what kind of calculations should be performed

    • Method Detail

      • calculateSquare

        double[] calculateSquare(String paramName,
                         Double paramValue)
        Square Calculator.

        Returns the set of the result as a double[] for given paramName and paramValue.
        Parameters:
        paramName - The String containing the name of calculation type
        paramValue - The String containing the value to be calculated
        Returns:
        A double[] representing the set of results

      • calculateRectangle

        double[] calculateRectangle(String paramName,
                            Double paramValue1,
                            Double paramValue2)
        Rectangle Calculator.

        Returns the set of the result as a double[] for given paramName and paramValue.
        Parameters:
        paramName - The String containing the name of calculation type
        paramValue1 - The String containing the first value to be calculated
        paramValue2 - The String containing the second value to be calculated
        Returns:
        A double[] representing the set of results

        BigDecimal[] calculateLength(String inputId,

        Unit converter: Length

        Returns the set of the result as a BigDecimal[] for given calculator id and inputValue inputId determines what kind of calculations should be performed
        Parameters:
        inputId - The String containing the id of type of calculation
        inputValue - The String containing the value to be calculated
        Returns:
        A BigDecimal[] representing the set of results

      • calculateCurrency

        List<Currency> calculateCurrency(String selectedCurrencyCode)
                          throws org.json.JSONException,
                                 IOException
        Returns the list of the Currency for given currency code
        Parameters:
        selectedCurrencyCode - The String containing the code of the currency
        Returns:
        A List<Currency> representing the list of the currencies
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - A JSONException is thrown when downloaded string can't be parsed to the JSONArray
        IOException - A IOException is thrown when the method can't download the currency table

      • calculatePercentage

        String calculatePercentage(int operationNumber,
                           double paramValue1,
                           double paramValue2)
        Returns the result for given values and operation number.
        Parameters:
        operationNumber - The int containing the number of the operation type
        paramValue1 - The double containing the first value to be calculated
        paramValue2 - The double containing the second value to be calculated
        Returns:
        A String representing the result
